entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 4.4°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late this morning and this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 04 May 2016
